item.title: Managed Services Give Small Companies an Edge
item.description: During the ongoing economic downturn, businesses of all sizes face the challenge of maintaining competitive electronic services with limited budgets. Managed services present a solution, particularly for smaller companies lacking substantial IT departments and hiring capacity. The concept of managed services is straightforward: you delegate management to an external provider. Consider your phone system. One option is to independently research, purchase, and install a PBX system, along with the necessary hardware and staff.
